The U.S Supreme Court has blocked a massive climate change lawsuit brought by young environmentalist the plaintiffs in the case range in age from ten to Twenty one argue the government has failed to protect natural resources is a public trust for future generations despite knowing for decades the fossil fuels we're causing climate change

A drug that harnesses the immune system to fight cancer can help women live longer as they find a particularly bad form of breast cancer NPR's Rob Stein says that's according to new research released on Saturday
There's the type of breast cancer called triple negative breast cancer that's notoriously deadly it's especially common among African American women researchers tried combining a drug that on leashes the immune system with the standard chemotherapy drugs in this study involving four hundred and fifty on women with triple negative breast cancer
